headline: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) Beats Earnings Estimates, Analysts Lift Price Targets
summary: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) is among the top 8 defense stocks based on ChatGPT’s advice. On October 30, the company reported strong results for the third quarter of fiscal 2025 and announced an increase in its full-year financial guidance. LHX’s revenue was reported at $5.7 billion, up 7% year-over-year and 10% organically, amid growth across […]
